title: Fragment Of Garment With Bands, 4th–6th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool.
Technique: Plain woven linen with in-woven wool slit tapestry and supplementary weft wrapping
description: Fragment with pair of bands showing twining cords making interlaced spirals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of Garment With Bands, 4th–6th century.
4th–6th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; Z-spun linen, Z-spun wool.
Technique: Plain woven linen with in-woven wool slit tapestry and supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-66.
